title: Le dernier des monstres
overview: Thomas Leclerc, a sympathetic and somewhat nerd theologian, finds himself in the face of a complex police investigation. Detective Savard, a friend, asks for his expertise to decode religious symbols left on the bodies of victims of sordid murders. Thomas's intuitive intelligence, as well as his great knowledge, makes it possible to establish a link between crimes and a mysterious group of devotees with a troubled past.
